verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> called אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> and spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him מֵאֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> unto him out of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> unto them If any man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יַקְרִ֥יב <S%H7126><s%> of you bring מִכֶּ֛ם <S%H4480><s%> at קָרְבָּ֖ן <S%H7133><s%> an offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <S%H929><s%> of the cattle מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַבָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> [even] of the herd וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> or הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> and of the flock תַּקְרִ֖יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> ye shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבַּנְכֶֽם׃ <S%H7133><s%> your offering

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עֹלָ֤ה <S%H5930><s%> [be] a burnt sacrifice קָרְבָּנוֹ֙ <S%H7133><s%> If his offering מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַבָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> of the herd זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> a male תָּמִ֖ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish יַקְרִיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7126><s%> let him offer אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פֶּ֝תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the door אֹ֤הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation יַקְרִ֣יב <S%H7126><s%> he shall offer אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> לִרְצֹנ֖וֹ <S%H7522><s%> it of his own voluntary will לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְסָמַ֣ךְ <S%H5564><s%> And he shall put יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> his behalf רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering וְנִרְצָ֥ה <S%H7521><s%> and it shall be accepted ל֖וֹ לְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> for him to make atonement עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> his behalf

וְשָׁחַ֛ט <S%H7819><s%> And he shall kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> sons הַבָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> bull לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְ֠הִקְרִיבוּ <S%H7126><s%> shall bring בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron's הַֽכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood וְזָרְק֨וּ <S%H2236><s%> and sprinkle אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> round about אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> is פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> that [is by] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְהִפְשִׁ֖יט <S%H6584><s%> And he shall flay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering וְנִתַּ֥ח <S%H5408><s%> and cut אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> לִנְתָחֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5409><s%> it into his pieces

וְ֠נָתְנוּ <S%H5414><s%> shall put בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar וְעָרְכ֥וּ <S%H6186><s%> in order עֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> and lay the wood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> upon the fire

וְעָרְכ֗וּ <S%H6186><s%> in order בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> Aaron's הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> And the priests אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הַנְּתָחִ֔ים <S%H5409><s%> the parts אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הָרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the head וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֑דֶר <S%H6309><s%> and the fat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעֵצִים֙ <S%H6086><s%> upon the wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> that [is] on the fire אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> which [is] upon the altar

וְקִרְבּ֥וֹ <S%H7130><s%> But his inwards וּכְרָעָ֖יו <S%H3767><s%> and his legs יִרְחַ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> shall he wash בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water וְהִקְטִ֨יר <S%H6999><s%> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> all on the altar עֹלָ֛ה <S%H5930><s%> [to be] a burnt sacrifice אִשֵּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיח֖וֹחַ <S%H5207><s%> of a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD ס

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> is from הַצֹּ֨אן <S%H6629><s%> [be] of the flocks קָרְבָּנ֧וֹ <S%H7133><s%> And if his offering מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַכְּשָׂבִ֛ים <S%H3775><s%> [namely] of the sheep א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָעִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> or of the goats לְעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt sacrifice זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> it a male תָּמִ֖ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish יַקְרִיבֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H7126><s%> he shall bring

וְשָׁחַ֨ט <S%H7819><s%> And he shall kill אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> on יֶ֧רֶךְ <S%H3409><s%> it on the side הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar צָפֹ֖נָה <S%H6828><s%> northward לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְזָרְק֡וּ <S%H2236><s%> shall sprinkle בְּנֵי֩ <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron's הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמ֛וֹ <S%H1818><s%> his blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וְנִתַּ֤ח <S%H5408><s%> And he shall cut אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> לִנְתָחָ֔יו <S%H5409><s%> it into his pieces וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <S%H7218><s%> with his head וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּדְר֑וֹ <S%H6309><s%> and his fat וְעָרַ֤ךְ <S%H6186><s%> shall lay them in order הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priest אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָֽעֵצִים֙ <S%H6086><s%> on the wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> that [is] on the fire אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> which [is] upon the altar

וְהַקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> the inwards וְהַכְּרָעַ֖יִם <S%H3767><s%> and the legs יִרְחַ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> But he shall wash בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> with water וְהִקְרִ֨יב <S%H7126><s%> shall bring הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all וְהִקְטִ֣יר <S%H6999><s%> [it] all and burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> [it] upon the altar עֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> it [is] a burnt sacrifice ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אִשֵּׁ֛ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פ

וְאִ֧ם <S%H518><s%> if מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָע֛וֹף <S%H5775><s%> [be] of fowls עֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> And if the burnt sacrifice קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <S%H7133><s%> for his offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD וְהִקְרִ֣יב <S%H7126><s%> then he shall bring מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַתֹּרִ֗ים <S%H8449><s%> of turtledoves א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> or of young הַיּוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3123><s%> pigeons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבָּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H7133><s%> his offering

וְהִקְרִיב֤וֹ <S%H7126><s%> shall bring הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> it unto the altar וּמָלַק֙ <S%H4454><s%> and wring off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> his head וְהִקְטִ֖יר <S%H6999><s%> and burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <S%H4196><s%> [it] on the altar וְנִמְצָ֣ה <S%H4680><s%> thereof shall be wrung out דָמ֔וֹ <S%H1818><s%> and the blood עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on קִ֥יר <S%H7023><s%> at the side הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar

וְהֵסִ֥יר <S%H5493><s%> And he shall pluck away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֻרְאָת֖וֹ <S%H4760><s%> his crop בְּנֹצָתָ֑הּ <S%H5133><s%> with his feathers וְהִשְׁלִ֨יךְ <S%H7993><s%> and cast אֹתָ֜הּ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֤צֶל <S%H681><s%> it beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> the altar קֵ֔דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> on the east part אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> by the place הַדָּֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1880><s%> of the ashes

וְשִׁסַּ֨ע <S%H8156><s%> And he shall cleave אֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> בִכְנָפָיו֮ <S%H3671><s%> it with the wings לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַבְדִּיל֒ <S%H914><s%> thereof [but] shall not divide [it] asunder וְהִקְטִ֨יר <S%H6999><s%> shall burn אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <S%H4196><s%> it upon the altar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> upon the wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הָאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> that [is] upon the fire עֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> it [is] a burnt sacrifice ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אִשֵּׁ֛ה <S%H801><s%> an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <S%H5207><s%> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD ס
